People with lipedema may tend to bruise easily, possibly due to increased fragility of small blood vessel within the fat tissue.",GARD,Lipedema
What causes Lipedema ?,"What causes lipedema? The cause of lipedema is unknown. Hormones appear to play a role, especially considering that the condition occurs almost enti
